statements: DELETE FROM property_rental_data WHERE property_id = 101 AND rental_price > 1500.00;
DELETE FROM property_rental_data WHERE rental_start_date < '2022-01-01' AND occupancy_rate < 0.8;
DELETE FROM property_managers WHERE manager_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM rental_trends WHERE property_id = 1001 AND rental_rate > 150.00;
DELETE FROM property_managers WHERE manager_id = 2005 OR manager_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM occupancy_rates WHERE property_id = 1 AND occupancy_date < '2021-01-01';
DELETE FROM RentalTrends WHERE property_id = 1001 AND rental_date = '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM OccupancyRates WHERE occupancy_percentage < 80 AND property_id IN (SELECT property_id FROM Properties WHERE city = 'New York');
